body:
Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) stock is presently standing at about $40.23 and lots of equity research firms seem to have a target price set on the stock. The median one-year price target of 36 analysts covering the company is $44.50, which suggests the stock could still rise over 10 percent. The highest analyst price target is $52.00, which implies a rally of 71 percent. And a quick view of analyst notes show that 14 are rating the stock a buy while 8 rate ORCL a strong buy. There are 13 equity research firms advocating a Hold and 0 consider it Sell.

Wells Fargo analysts provided their view on Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) recently. The rating firm issued a Outperform rating to this company in a research note released on Jan 11, 2017. Rosenblatt analysts disclosed their opinion on Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) recently. The rating firm gave a Buy rating to this stock in a research note published on Aug 08, 2016. According to a research note disclosed on Jul 12, 2016, analysts at BMO Capital Markets have upped their rating on these shares from Market Perform to Outperform.

Several insiders were part of recent insider activity for the stock. Its Director GARCIA-MOLINA HECTOR sold 3,750 company shares for $146000.59, in a transaction on 2017-01-17. Following the transaction, the Director is left with a stake of 146.59 shares, currently valued at $5897. Meanwhile, Director SELIGMAN NAOMI O sold 45,000 shares worth $1742000.4, through a transaction dated 2016-12-21. Following the completion of the transaction, the insider is left with a stake of 15,051 shares, amounting $605501.73. ORCL Director GARCIA-MOLINA HECTOR also sold 3,750 shares, at a stock price of $40.85. This transaction occurred on 2016-12-15 totals $153000.19. After this transaction, the insider’s stake stands at 6,406 shares, with a market value of $257713.

Executives hold 27.24 percent of the stock. Lawrence J. Ellison is one of the biggest insider owners in Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL), according to U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filings. The insider owns 1,122,053,736 shares which have current market value of around $45140221799.28.Ms. Safra Ada Catz is another major inside shareholder in the company. The insider owns 461,860 shares as of less than 0.1%, currently worth $18580627.8. Mr. Mark V. Hurd is ranked as third insider holder of the stock. This insider holds 203,891 shares with a market value around $8202534.93 as of recent close.

In Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL)’s latest quarter, EPS moved to $0.61 from $0.55 in preceding quarter and revenues reached at $9,070.00M compared to $8,613.00M. Analysts had expected Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) to post net income of about $0.60 per share on $9,115.58M in revenue. Looking ahead, analysts on average predict that earnings for the current quarter would come in in the range of $0.55 to $0.63. That is compared with the $0.64 in EPS it reported during the same period a year ago.
title: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) Analysts Recommendations and Insider Trading | The Independent Republic
